body_html:
Yeah, it looks like the Maxwell kernels are specifically slow for batches of very small sgemms. For larger size, e.g. 1000x1000, Kepler and Maxwell are about equally fast.

@ngimel who is the right person to talk to about cublas?

@ngimel who is the right person to talk to about cublas?
body:
Yeah, it looks like the Maxwell kernels are specifically slow for batches of very small `sgemm`s. For larger size, e.g. `1000x1000`, Kepler and Maxwell are about equally fast.

@ngimel who is the right person to talk to about cublas?
